
# 8_2echarts展示数据

**Echarts快速使用**

![image](data:image/png;base64,)
**
**

**
**

1.  **<!DOCTYPE html>**
2.  **<html style="height: 100%">**
3.  **   <head>**
4.  **       <meta charset="utf-8">**
5.  **       <script type="text/javascript" src="js/echarts.min.js" ></script>**
6.  **       <script type="text/javascript">**
7.  **               	function showData(){**
8.  **               		var dom = document.getElementById("container");**
9.  **                                var myChart = echarts.init(dom);**
10. **                                var app = {};**
11. **                                option = null;**
12. **                                option = {**
13. **                                    legend: {},**
14. **                                    tooltip: {},**
15. **                                    dataset: {**
16. **                                        source: [**
17. **                                            ['product', '第一季度', '第二季度',
    '第三季度','第四季度'],**
18. **                                            ['茉莉', 43.3, 85.8, 93.7,99.9],**
19. **                                            ['奶茶', 83.1, 73.4, 55.1,66.6],**
20. **                                            ['绿茶', 86.4, 65.2, 82.5,88.8],**
21. **                                            ['咖啡', 72.4, 53.9, 39.1,77.1],**
22. **                                            ['红茶', 11.4, 22.9, 33.1,44.1]**
23. **                                        ]**
24. **                                    },**
25. **                                    xAxis: {type: 'category'},**
26. **                                    yAxis: {},**
27. **                                    // Declare several bar series, each
    will be mapped**
28. **                                    // to a column of dataset.source by
    default.**
29. **                                    series: [**
30. **                                        {type: 'bar'},**
31. **                                        {type: 'bar'},**
32. **                                        {type: 'bar'},**
33. **                                        {type: 'bar'}**
34. **                                    ]**
35. **                                };**
36. **                                ;**
37. **                                if (option && typeof option === "object") {**
38. **                                    myChart.setOption(option, true);**
39. **                                }**
40. **               	}**
41. **       </script>**
42. **   </head>**
43. **   <body style="height: 100%; margin: 0">**
44. **       <div id="container" style="height: 300px;width: 800px;border: 1px
    solid red; margin: 0px auto;"></div>**
45. **       **
46. **       **
47. **       <input type="button" value="显示数据" onclick="showData()" />**
48. **   </body>**
49. **</html>**

**
**
